response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 to us, reflecting its unique features, durability, and the expertise poured into its creation. We believe it holds significant value for someone like yourself who appreciates excellence and innovation. I kindly invite you to consider this opportunity to own a piece of our craftsmanship. Should you have any questions or wish to discuss the product further, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 15000}
